sourcesContent:
// src/components/OwnerDashboard.jsx import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const OwnerDashboard = () => { const ownerName = "Welcome, Owner"; // Sample vehicle data with availability status const [vehicles, setVehicles] = useState([ { id: 1, name: "Truck A - Tata 407", type: "Light Commercial", capacity: "2.5 tons", status: "available", driver: "Rajesh Kumar" }, { id: 2, name: "Truck B - Ashok Leyland", type: "Medium Commercial", capacity: "7.5 tons", status: "unavailable", driver: "Suresh Singh" }, { id: 3, name: "Truck C - Mahindra Bolero", type: "Pickup", capacity: "1.5 tons", status: "available", driver: "Amit Patel" }, { id: 4, name: "Truck D - Eicher Pro", type: "Heavy Commercial", capacity: "16 tons", status: "available", driver: "Vikram Sharma" }, { id: 5, name: "Truck E - Bharat Benz", type: "Medium Commercial", capacity: "9 tons", status: "unavailable", driver: "Ramesh Kumar" }, ]); const actions = [ { label: "ðŸ“‹ View Available Loads", path: "/loads" }, { label: "ðŸš› Register Vehicle", path: "/add-vehicle" }, { label: "ðŸ‘· Vehicle Status", path: "/vehicle-status" }, { label: "ðŸ“ž Contact Brokers", path: "/contact-brokers" }, ]; const availableVehicles = vehicles.filter(v => v.status === "available"); const unavailableVehicles = vehicles.filter(v => v.status === "unavailable"); return (

LorryTracker Owner Dashboard

{ownerName}

{/* Quick Actions */}
{actions.map((item) => ( {item.label} ))}
{/* Vehicle Availability Section */}

Vehicle Availability

{/* Available Vehicles */}

Available Vehicles ({availableVehicles.length})

{availableVehicles.map((vehicle) => (
{vehicle.name}

{vehicle.type} â€¢ {vehicle.capacity}

Driver: {vehicle.driver}

Available
))}
{/* Unavailable Vehicles */}

Unavailable Vehicles ({unavailableVehicles.length})

{unavailableVehicles.map((vehicle) => (
{vehicle.name}

{vehicle.type} â€¢ {vehicle.capacity}

Driver: {vehicle.driver}

Unavailable
))}
{/* Summary Stats */}

Fleet Summary

{availableVehicles.length}

Available

{unavailableVehicles.length}

Unavailable

{vehicles.length}

Total Vehicles

); }; export default OwnerDashboard;
